dtliExcerpt: This handsome revival of the 1960 Lerner and Loewe musical benefits from smart direction by Rachel Chavkin and elegant design work, but it can't overcome the fundamental problems with a show that's always been more spectacle than story.
showScoreExcerpt: This handsome revival of the 1960 Lerner and Loewe musical benefits from smart direction by Rachel Chavkin and elegant design work, but it can't overcome the fundamental problems with a show that's always been more spectacle than story.
